name: Short Track
description:
Made for Weekly Game Jam - Week 106

Theme: "0h No!"

Short track speed skating game because Apolo Anton Ohno!

Controls:

  • Left Arrow - Left Skate
  • Right Arrow - Right Skate
  • Back Arrow - Brake
  • Escape - Pause
  • Alternate left and right skates to go forward and accelerate
  • Repeatedly press left or right skate to go right or left, respectively

Things not done:

  • No AI in race
  • Race doesn't end when you hit 0 laps
  • No sound
  • No animations
  • Controls aren't great
  • Speed, turning need tuned
  • Other things I'm probably forgetting

Made with Godot v3.1.1
